channel.title: How to make an npc do an emote?
channel.description:
how would i make an npc lets just say a man do and emote like dance?
please don't tell me to use google.com or the search bar because i've already tryed.
and help would be appreciated

item.title: How to make an npc do an emote?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

okay open up your npc handler and search for the npc name you want youll see somethign similar to this

[code] } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200 && misc.random(3)==1 && plr.ProtRange) {

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 3146;
hitDiff = 0;
plr.specGFX(451);
[/code]

change the animNumber to waht you want and there you go >.>

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an npc do an emote?
